data.title: Top shelf staff
data.text: I have a very specific reason for my five star rating. My wife, my daughter and I were wandering around downtown Modesto this weekend and stopped here for snacks and drinks. This place occupies the north east corner of 11th and I street, and has a fenced patio in front great for people watching. An employee of Firkin & Fox by the name of Devry took my second order at the bar. He handed me my drink, I handed him what I thought was a ten dollar bill and walked back out to the patio. On my way back to our table I see him through the window trying to get my attention. I waved him off meaning "keep the change", and sat down. A couple minutes later he shows up with forty two dollars change and says "sir you gave me a fifty". Devry is a credit to himself and his establishment. If he is the example of the type of person Firkin & Fox employs, they have made permanent customers out of me and my family. This website will not be the only place that I give this review, myself and most of the people I know are working class and tend to go out on the weekend. We share our adventures good and bad and I will definitely be passing this one along. Thank you Devry for your honesty and the killer Long Island Ice Tea.

data.title: Great service, good food.
data.text:
The service here was excellent, the restaurant was full with people visiting the Gallo arts centre across the road, but the food arrived quickly, hot and tasty, just what we needed. 
Great garlic fries, and a good cottage pie with lovely vegetables.

data.title: Relaxing and Pleasant Spot to Eat
data.text: Great place to have an enjoyable dining experience. Drink & Food selections to please everyone.  Extensive bar.  Service excellent - attentive, but not intrusive. Very pleasant experience.

data.title: Fish and chips while waiting for concert at the Gallo .
data.text:
I usually sit at the bar or a small table opposit it. They have some nice tap brews and harder alcohol drinks also. Service is all you can ask for, fast and attentive with a smile.
I am pretty much stuck on the Fish and Chips because it the best in Modesto, so I can't tell you about the other foods.

data.title: Relax and enjoy the experience
data.text: I had my birthday dinner here in December. We had 10 in our group and we had a lovely spot upstairs. Everyone said their food was fabulous and we had a marvelous time. However....if you are on a schedule or have tix for the Gallo (across the street) don't come here. Come AFTER the show.  You will not be served in a timely manner and you will probably miss the first part of your concert or show or be anxious that you will.  So that's why I said relax and enjoy the experience… Come when you are not time pressed. The food is fabulous, the atmosphere is so English pub and you will totally enjoy everything about this delightful restaurant.

data.title: SOOOOO Good!
data.text:
I took my granddaughter here for dinner before her play at Gallo Theater. We sat for quite awhile with friends and they were very cordial about us being there. 
Service was fantastic. The bartender was also the server and made sure we were well taken care of as well as having to work the bar area. 
I would highly recommend here for an evening out.

data.title: Better than average for Modesto
data.text: Modesto does not host the best night life of California, but this place has a great atmosphere.  Everything form bar, high top, restaurant seating and lounge chairs.  It is a great local place to grab a drink, and maybe get something to eat too.  Great fish and chips, we also get the Irish Nachos (odd but very good bar food)

data.title: Great Downtown Bar
data.text: Friendly and knowledgeable bar staff. Reminiscent of an "old time" bar with lots of character. Love that there's an upstairs area too.

data.title: Good brew
data.text: I like the brew at the the Firkin & Fox but I'm not a fan of their food.  I've tried 2 or 3 times and have been disappointed with each meal.  Too many other restaurants downtown where you can get a much better meal.  I won't go back for the food but their micro beer is good.

data.title: Friendly and Fun!
data.text: What an awesome experience before a Shinedown concert.  The patrons are friendly and the bartender is awesome.  The atmosphere is welcoming and it has good food.  My go to place if ever in Modesto!

data.title: A Little on the Eclectic Side!
data.text: Stopped in for a beer one day while I was downtown. Didn't have anything to eat but they did have a pretty good beer selection. Won't make a special trip but I will stop in if I'm in the area!

data.title: Good Food & Service
data.text: We arrived about two hours before the start of a show at the Gallo Center (across the street).  We were greeted by the friendly staff, and seated quickly.  I ordered the Chicken Pot Pie & my wife had the California Sandwich.  Both items were very good.  The service was fast the friendly.  Most of the seating is up a tall staircase, so if stairs are an issue for you it is best to call and reserve a table downstairs.

data.title: Nice place to visit near Gallo Center
data.text:
Whenever I go to the Gallo Center for a show, I make it a point to visit here, whether for dinner or a quick drink.

The food is more than your typical pub menu and there are dining areas on both levels. The bar area itself is small but cozy.  The last time I was there we had to wait a while for our food but they were very busy so that's understandable.

Again, to me, a trip to the Gallo Center isn't complete without the Firkin & Fox

data.title: Not the best burgers
data.text:
My friend and I went for dinner before a show on her recommendation that they had a great burger. While walking to our table, my feet kept sticking to the floor which wasn't a good first impression. Service was slow and getting dinner out of the kitchen was also slow m
The house made chicken mushroom soup was wonderfully tasty and wish I had ordered a bowl instead of a cup and skipped the burger.  The burger at first bite tasted like the need was sour or bad, so neither of us ate any more out of fear we would regret it later. Definitely wouldn't recommend the burgers or rate their cleanliness worthy of any restaurant.

data.title: Cool bar
data.text: Great relaxed atmosphere, more for a crowd that just wants to hang out and chill with some friends. Good drinks and speedy service. Food is OK.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Perfect place to enjoy a meal before seeing a show across the street! Try the fish and chips, Great choice!

data.title: Food is fine but...
data.text:
Bartender was the wait staff.  She spent more time chatting with the buss girl than on service.  I can't tell you how grossed out I was when a fellow brought in his under 5 year old bare foot daughter into the kitchen and then allowed her, with dirty feet, to dance on one of the counters where glasses and utensils were stored as the staff laughed and chatted.
I will never return.

data.title: Quick Bite Before A Show at the GALLO CENTER
data.text: Best place to eat before or after a show at the Gallo Center. They have creative and delicious dishes, fast service and a great view.  Fun for people watching too.  They also have a bar but we don't drink.

data.title: Great for dinner and a show
data.text: My husband and I eat here often when we attend an evening performance at the Gallo Center for the Arts, just across the street. The staff are very accommodating to be sure you get your food in time for the show, but can sometimes be crowded during a popular show, so be sure to arrive a little early or you might not get seated in time. Great menu selection and atmosphere. We've always had good service. Love the fish&chips, burgers and salads, Irish nachos, pulled pork and cottage pie, just to name a few.

data.title: Can not rate
data.text: We walked into this place twice and both times; which were months apart we were ignored totally. After waiting 15 minutes the first time we just left and the second time we only gave them 10 minutes. They were not even busy (at least not with us) but they were all talking and joking with each other and some of the bar patrons. We just wanted a drink but I guess we are too old for this place. I think my money is too old for this place too so I will gladly spend it elsewhere.
